    • Method Detail

      • useHintText

        public TextDecorator useHintText​(java.lang.String hint)

        Defines the grayed text within a text field. This text will be removed when a user selects the Text widget.

        Since:
        0.8

      • setAutoCapitalization

        public TextDecorator setAutoCapitalization​(TextDecorator.AutoCapitalization capitalization)

        Since:

      • useAsciiKeyboard

        Since:
        0.8

      • useLocalClipboard

        public TextDecorator useLocalClipboard()

        Instructs the Text to keep cut / copied text on client (i.e. disable 'clipboard sharing' on iOs devices). iOS only.

        Since:
        3.4

      • disableLookupAction

        Instructs the Text to disable the iOs 'Lookup' action.

      • setKeyboardAppearanceMode

        public TextDecorator setKeyboardAppearanceMode​(TextDecorator.KeyboardAppearance appearance)

      • setEnterKeyType

        public TextDecorator setEnterKeyType​(TextDecorator.EnterKeyType type)

        Allows to control label or icon to display on the keyboard â€˜confirmationâ€™ key. Setting an enterKeyType other than default will change the key behavior to not close the keyboard automatically.

        Since:
        3.10
